settings.heading: Step by Step Guide How to Install Ezy Screens
settings.description: Explore Ezy Screens video tutorials. Here you will learn everything there is to know about DIY fly screens.

settings.measurement_title: How to Measure DIY Fly Screens
settings.card1_text: Our retractable screens must be installed inside the frame that has at least 35mm of unobstructed depth, be sure to check for any hardware that may intrude in the frame.
settings.card2_text: You will need to measure the top and bottom widths & the left and right heights to the closest MM. Ezy Screens are designed to sit inside the frame on the inside or outside of your home.

settings.heading: DIY Retractable Screens Made Simple With Step-By-Step Guides Trusted By Australian Families.

settings.text:
At Ezy Screens, we are an Australian, family-run business committed to bringing comfort, style, and practicality into homes across the country. Our premium retractable screens are designed to blend seamlessly into your space, giving you uninterrupted views, natural airflow, and the freedom to open your home without inviting in the bugs.

Whether you’re a hands-on DIYer or prefer professional installation, our screens are made with you in mind - easy to measure, simple to install, and crafted to last. We’ve made it possible to enjoy luxury living and reliable protection at an affordable price.


✓ DIY Made Easy: Follow our step-by-step measuring and installation guides.

✓ Luxury Without Limits: Sleek designs that suit every style of home.

✓ Affordable Comfort: Premium quality from a trusted Australian family-run brand.


Upgrade your home today and explore our tutorials to see just how effortless your DIY project can be with Ezy Screens.

settings.heading: Consider the Style of Mouldings
settings.description:
Live in an art deco home? Different types of architrave mouldings on your door or window frame can affect the installation process of your DIY retractable fly screens. As architrave mouldings are usually ornate and have different depths, it's essential to choose which depth layer you would like to fit your mesh screen. Consider the following installation tips:

  • The Jamb/frame/moulding depth of at least 35mmD on the top and sides of the frame.
  • The bottom of the architrave moulding or the floor on the plane of this layer must be flat, or show a depth of over 20mmD.
  • There are no obstructions such as window hardware or alarm system control boxes on the plane of this layer.

Once you select the layer of the architrave on where you want your DIY fly screen to go, you can begin to measure the width and height of the opening. We suggest measuring the height of the opening at both ends and same with the width.

Interested in Ezy’s screens cost-effective solutions? Contact our team today for more information, or register online for the latest product information.

settings.heading: Upgrade Your Home Today
settings.subheading: Transform your home with our reliable and stylish solutions. Get in touch with us now to find the perfect fit for your needs!
